Pre-Game Insights: Phillies manager Rob Thomson expressed confidence in Ranger Suárez's ability to perform well in the playoffs despite his recent struggles.
Suárez acknowledged that his back injury may have affected his performance and is looking to bounce back in the postseason.
Post-Match Reflections: Suárez stated he was hoping for a better start before the playoffs and intended to move forward with a fresh mindset.
Manager Thomson mentioned that Suárez's performance was not as crisp as usual and hoped the playoff atmosphere would help him regain his form.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article discusses Suárez's recent performance and his importance to the Phillies' playoff plans.
